lead_paragraph: SCHUBERT--Kenneth A.,born in Long Island, NY, November 11, 1926, died in Vero Beach, FL, March 4, 2016. Predeceased by his wife of 60 years, Marcia Kuhlke Schubert, he is survived by his sister, Mildred Lemke; four daughters: Lisa Schubert, Carol Kuntz, Robin Sells, Wendy Hammarstrom and their families. Memorial contributions may be directed to the charity of one's choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHUBERT, KENNETH A.
